summary: Completed all 6 phases of the Rank Math Pro infrastructure implementation: Installed spatie/laravel-settings package, created GeneralSettings and SeoSettings classes with Filament admin pages, built redirection manager (Redirect model, Filament resource with CSV import, HandleRedirections middleware, NotFoundLog for 404 monitoring), updated SitemapController to integrate with SeoSettings and include image support, updated frontend layout to include header/footer scripts and favicon from settings, and shared GeneralSettings globally via AppServiceProvider. All models already had HasSEO trait. Created 404 log resource with ability to create redirects from logs.
current_status: All core CMS infrastructure is in place. Ready for migration. Next steps: Run migrations, configure initial settings in Filament admin, test sitemap generation, and verify redirect functionality.
